name: the-abubakr-online
description: The Abubakr Online - Personal brand website by Muhammad Abubakr

scripts.build:dino: cd "dino qr code" && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:dino: cd "dino qr code" && npm run dev
scripts.preview: cd "dino qr code" && npm run preview
scripts.start: python -m http.server 8000 || python3 -m http.server 8000 || npx serve .

author: Muhammad Abubakr
